note.p: Land agent. Of Holme Pierrepont, afterwards of London. Succeeded his father, William Sanday, farming at Holme Pierrepont. Became agent to Lord Bolton at Wensley, Yorkshire, in 1874. Joined Rawlence and Squarey, land agents at Salisbury and in London in 1884. Council member of the Royal Agricultural Society, 1874–1902; vice-president, 1902–5.
